content.body: you already said good style tho :-p

> <@ljharb:matrix.org> you already said good style tho :-p

In Linus’ words, from the Linux kernel style guide:

> First off, I'd suggest printing out a copy of the GNU coding standards,
and NOT read it.  Burn them, it's a great symbolic gesture.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @ljharb:matrix.org
you already said good style tho :-p

In Linus’ words, from the Linux kernel style guide:

First off, I'd suggest printing out a copy of the GNU coding standards,
and NOT read it. Burn them, it's a great symbolic gesture.
